## Final Project Milestone 3
Congress Generic Ballot Polls from FiveThirtyEight
Source: https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data/tree/master/congress-generic-ballot

```{r}
generic_ballot_averages <- read.csv("congress-generic-ballot/generic_ballot_averages.csv")
generic_pollist <- read.csv("congress-generic-ballot/generic_pollist.csv")
generic_topline_historical <- read.csv("congress-generic-ballot/generic_topline_historical.csv")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
president_primary_polls <- read.csv("president_primary_polls.csv")
```

```{r}
president_primary_polls
```

```{r}
president_primary_polls |>
  filter(party == "REP") |>
  group_by(candidate_name) |>
  summarize(mean_pct = mean(pct)) |>
  filter(mean_pct >= 3.0) |>
  knitr::kable(digits = 2)
```
